parameters.body: ={{ JSON.stringify({ contents: [ { parts: [ { inline_data: { mime_type: 'application/pdf', data: Buffer.from($json.body, 'binary').toString('base64') } }, { text: 'Extract all data from this Israeli Form 106 (טופס 106) tax document and return ONLY valid JSON with these fields: tax_year, employee_name, employee_id, employer_name, employer_id, total_income, total_tax_paid, tax_credit_points, work_months. Use null for missing fields. Return ONLY the JSON object, no other text.' } ] } ] }) }}

assignments.name: debug_info
assignments.value: ={{ { gemini_keys: Object.keys($json || {}), response_preview: JSON.stringify($json).substring(0, 500), candidates_exists: !!$json.candidates, candidates_length: $json.candidates?.length || 0, text_extracted: $json.candidates?.[0]?.content?.parts?.[0]?.text || 'NO TEXT FOUND' } }}
